# Introduction

Introductory workshop about Generalized Linear Models starting from the general theory, model fitting, parameters intepretation and data simulation.

# Materials

- [GLMphd](https://stat-teaching.github.io/GLMphd/) is a complete course on GLM hosted by the [PhD Course in Psychological Sciences](dottorato.psy.unipd.it/en) (University of Padova).
